metadata.description: Source of Truth Requirements Index for SSID Project

MUST.name: Central Policy Management
MUST.description: All compliance policies must be managed centrally in 23_compliance/policies/

MUST.name: Anti-Gaming Controls
MUST.description: Anti-gaming validators must be active and enforced

MUST.name: Audit Trail Requirement
MUST.description: All critical operations must be logged to 02_audit_logging with WORM storage

MUST.name: Identity Risk Scoring
MUST.description: Identity scoring system must be operational for risk assessment

MUST.name: Hash-Only Data Policy
MUST.description: No PII storage - only SHA3-256 hashes with tenant-specific peppers

MUST.name: Non-Custodial Architecture
MUST.description: System must maintain non-custodial architecture - users control keys

MUST.name: Immutable Evidence Storage
MUST.description: Evidence must be stored in WORM (Write-Once-Read-Many) format

MUST.name: Blockchain Anchoring
MUST.description: Critical audit logs must be anchored to blockchain (Ethereum/Polygon)

MUST.description: 24-Root structure must be enforced via CI gates (Exit Code 24)

MUST.name: Maximum Depth Constraint
MUST.description: Directory structure must not exceed max_depth=3
